response.overview: Performed at the Nippon Budokan on February 23, 2019. For their second "Return to Budokan," Poppin'Party delivers a sentimental and varied 19-track performance. The concert is famous for its unique structure: a high-energy opening, a mid-set "character solo" and acoustic medley where members played short versions of their personal songs, and a high-octane finale.  Setlist: 1. Double Rainbow 2. Happy Happy Party! 3. Kimi ja Nakya Dame Mitai (Cover) 4. only my railgun (Cover) - Character Solo & Acoustic Medley - 5. Hanazono Denki Guitar!!! (Short ver.) 6. Doki Doki SING OUT! (Short ver.) 7. B.O.F (Acoustic ver.) 8. Tooi Ongaku ~Heartbeat~ (Short ver.) 9. Su-Suki Nanka Janai! (Short ver.) 10. Poppin' Shuffle (Acoustic ver.) 11. Chocolate no Teion Recipe (Short ver.) 12. Kimi ni Moratta Mono (Acoustic ver.) - Full Band - 13. What's the POPIPA!? 14. Time Lapse 15. Teardrops 16. 1000-kai Urunda Sora 17. Kizuna Music♪ Encore: 18. CiRCLING 19. Jumpin'
response.title: BanG Dream! 7th☆LIVE Day 3: Poppin'Party 「Jumpin' Music♪」
